name: FSoundClassAdjuster
doc: Elements of data for sound group volume control

SoundClassObject: The sound class this adjuster affects.
VolumeAdjuster: A multiplier applied to the volume.
PitchAdjuster: A multiplier applied to the pitch.
LowPassFilterFrequency: Lowpass filter cutoff frequency to apply to sound sources.
bApplyToChildren: Set to true to apply this adjuster to all children of the sound class.
